Posts.Content: Thank you Helen. Your response is much appreciated and reassuring
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: Thank you Lynn, I live alone but a very good friend had been supporting me. What's upset me most over the last couple of days have been the insensitive questions I have been asked by folk who mean well.  Maybe I'm just being super sensitive. Karin xx
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: Thank you .. Everyone is so nice here.   I've had to stop work for a while and that's a scary one being self employed with no partner.  I've contacted the Maggie and will hopefully see the Welfare Officer soon to see what help I can get.   Dreading Thursday's large volume biopsy.. Can anyone tell me about it please ?  Karin x
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: No the letter simply calls it a Large Volume Biopsy
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: Hi I was diagnosed on the 27th of August. I've had umpteen mammograms and biopsies with another due this week. I've been told surgery will be next followed by chemo and radiotherapy...so stressed by the overwhelming feeling of not being in control and scared about what lies ahead.
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona, thanks for responding.  So good to hear that it's not as bad as it seems.  I'm mostly okay but have my moments.  I'm self employed which is a major worry.  I'm still working at the moment but it is stressing me and I'm going to stop for a while.   Worrying about money will no doubt be next on my list as I have no family to help me.
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: Thanks Nicky,  I've already had several of those types of biopsies.   This one is different it involves using a mammogram machine at the same time as a piece of apparatus.  I will post later on Thursay after I've had it done. Karin x
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: Hi, So sorry to hear that the BC has come back.  I'm really hoping that you get good news and that it hasn't spread.  Thank you for your message of support and for your advice about using e45. All the very best xx
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona, thanks. Good to hear that you have completed your treatment.  Your right about feeling that you have no control over anything except how you handle it.   Karin
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...
